module.name: Outbound Call Limit
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php - Restrict Outbound Calls at an outbound route level
module.changelog: *13.0.5.5* FREEPBX-14556 Outbound Call limit under connectivity saving without Name.. *13.0.5.4* FREEPBX-14566 Help text for Call limit under outbound routes needs to be changed. *13.0.5.3* FREEPBX-13986 add rnav *13.0.5.2* Internal fixes *13.0.5.1* FREEPBX-13751 Fix Recording Display and Update navigation *13.0.5* PHP 5.6 updates *13.0.4* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.3* FREEPBX-10423 Fix grid ajax to return empty array if no entries exist. *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Updates *12.0.1* Zend compatibility update 2.11.0.10 Fix view issues when unlicensed 2.11.0.9 Sales Cleanup 2.11.0.6 Fix issue where calllimit_usage wasn't be created on new install 2.11.0.5 Bump to force module to install 2.11.0.4 Fix potential issue with more than 10 groups. 2.11.0.3 Make default recording play. 2.11.0.2 Add ability to define more then 1 rule 2.11.0.1 Push for 2.11 2.10.0.8 re #1711 - 2.10.0.7 Packaging of ver 2.10.0.7 2.10.0.6 re #1472 - #1427 2.10.0.5 re #1392 - 2.10.0.4 re #1392 -
